price: 102. Nabiyow! (Nabii Mucammad kinnuk) ama Nabii Yuusuf caagidik koh warisnem wacyih koi oobisne qellitte xaagittek, atu Nabii Yuusuf toobokoh xaqul ma suginnito usun sinni caagid yeggereereqeeniih usun uma malah malsen waqdi.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَۖ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayka wamā kunta ladayhim idh ajmaʿū amrahum wahum yamkurūna
